short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: TotalBlocker will help you to easily get rid of annoying ads and you can use it just in one click
short.de: TotalBlocker hilft Ihnen, nervige Werbung leicht loszuwerden, und kann mit nur einem Klick verwendet werden
short.es: TotalBlocker te ayudará a deshacerte fácilmente de los anuncios molestos y puedes usarlo con solo un clic
short.fr: TotalBlocker vous aidera à vous débarrasser facilement des publicités ennuyeuses et vous pourrez l'utiliser en un seul clic
short.it: TotalBlocker ti aiuterà a eliminare facilmente, e con un solo clic, fastidiosi annunci pubblicitari
short.nl: TotalBlocker helpt je om op een eenvoudige manier vervelende reclame te verwijderen. Je kunt het met één klik gebruiken

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TotalBlocker is tailored to keep your browser experience smooth and private. It prevents you from possible threats and unwanted trackers and annoying ads.

To add TotalBlocker to your browser please click on "Add to Chrome". And then "Add Extension". Click on the TotalBlocker icon to see how many ads are blocked. And you can stop blocking by pressing a green button.
